Class CallCaptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.communication.calling.CallCaptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TeamsCaptions

    public abstract class CallCaptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Call captions for managing common captions functionality.
